GPUBufferMapAsync.summary:
The mapAsync() method of the
interface maps the specified range of the GPUBuffer. It returns a that resolves when the GPUBuffer's content is ready to be accessed. While the GPUBuffer is mapped it cannot be used in any GPU commands.

remarks.para: Once the buffer is successfully mapped (which can be checked via ), calls to will return an {{jsxref("ArrayBuffer")}} containing the GPUBuffer's current values, to be read and updated by JavaScript as required.
When you have finished working with the GPUBuffer values, call to unmap it, making it accessible to the GPU again.

GPUBufferMapAsync.returns: A that resolves to when the GPUBuffer's content is ready to be accessed.
